work.summary: Collaborating on cross-functional Scrum team to deliver APIs and event-based web services supporting laboratory information systems
highlights: Conducted comprehensive backend testing for APIs and cloud functions.
Performed front-end testing for clinical web-based diagnostic tools and messaging applications.
Designed, tracked, and executed manual tests.
Developed and maintained test documentation using Azure DevOps.

work.summary: Worked closely with release management and devops teams to support release testing for compliance-driven human resources application
highlights: Executed functionality and smoke tests using Postman and Swagger.
Researched tools for performance and load testing as part of an early DevOps initiative.
Identified and reported critical application bugs pre-release using the Atlassian suite.

work.summary: Automated UI test script development and test suite maintenance
highlights: Planned, developed, and maintained 800+ automated UI tests using C#, Selenium, and SpecFlow.
Collaborated closely with the development team to align testing with product requirements.
Provided technical mentorship to the manual testing team.

work.summary: Provided compliance and regulatory guidance for enterprise clinical IT and billing systems.
highlights: Guided development, deployment, and training teams to ensure compliance with regulations.
Directed stakeholders on compliance-related issues impacting clinical and billing systems.
Managed audit findings and resolved compliance matters for leadership.

work.summary: Administered and maintained integrated clinical and billing systems for a multi-location practice.

Administrator of Integrated Clinical/Bil: Configured and maintained user-facing and back-end components for clinical, billing, registration, and scheduling.
Served as the primary support resource for a 20-MD nephrology practice (~80 users across five outpatient locations).
Reported and provided guidance to partners and leadership on system issues and defects.
Researched and developed workflow solutions to meet clinical, billing, operational, and leadership needs.
Coordinated the management of clinical/billing interfaces with vendors and stakeholders, including bi-directional lab interfaces, claims processing, and, Meaningful Use reporting.
Ensured uptime and functionality during system upgrades and IT outages.
Security/Privacy Compliance Officer: Developed and deployed privacy and security training content and a comprehensive deployment plan.
Provided guidance on privacy and security considerations, ensuring compliance with HIPAA and security best practices.
Oversaw privacy and security aspects of clinical IT workflows, clinical research efforts, and vendor coordination.
Business Intelligence System Manager/Adm: Delivered monthly, quarterly, and annual financial and operational reports to partners and leadership with a focus on accuracy and timeliness.
Researched and implemented methods for advanced clinical and financial ad hoc reporting using existing resources.
Developed workflows for efficient delivery of data and reports to leadership, providers, and clinical end-users.
Supported the establishment of and advised the practice’s clinical quality reporting committee.
Co-Manager of IT Resources and Processes: Advised leadership on purchasing decisions and coordinated with managed IT services vendors to address daily and long-term technology needs.
Led a successful campaign to improve mobile device security, advocating for better compliance with HIPAA standards and convincing leadership to adopt a Mobile, Device Management (MDM) service.
Researched and deployed the MDM service, ensuring compliance with legal and regulatory requirements (e.g., CERT).
Administered and managed the company’s SharePoint system (2007), including extensive testing for migration to Office 365.

work.position: EMR/EHR System Consultant, Trainer, and Support Specialist
work.summary: Supported clinical and administrative users during EMR/EHR system implementations.
highlights: Delivered on-site training to diverse clinical users.
Created training materials tailored for clinical teams.
Provided technical guidance to project leadership.

work.position: Data Management Consultant in Program Evaluation
work.summary: Supported data migration and cleanup for a grant management system.
highlights: Structured legacy data to ensure migration accuracy.
Advised leadership on IT and information management improvements.

work.position: Research Project Manager in Workforce Development
work.summary: Led a regional research project to assess biotech workforce needs.
highlights: Designed and deployed iPad-based survey technology.
Managed project budgets and timelines.
Delivered statistical analysis and actionable insights.

work.company: National Center for Disaster Preparedness/Columbia University School of Public Health
work.summary: Supervised data collection for a longitudinal study on Hurricane Katrina's health impacts.
highlights: Coordinated field team operations to ensure data quality.
Engaged with community organizations to improve participation rates.
Provided logistical and technical support to field teams.

work.summary: Instructed 6th and 8th grade students in English and language arts.
highlights: Integrated technology into student learning through computer enrichment classes.

work.summary: Managed content and layout for local and national news sections.
highlights: Oversaw weekly health content and opinion sections.
Developed the publication’s first weekly insights section.

work.summary: Edited and designed pages for various newspaper sections.

skills.name: Testing
keywords: Methodologies: Integration Testing (manual and automated), API Testing, Event-Based Stack Testing, Security Testing, Exploratory Testing, E2E Testing, Database and Data Integrity Testing, Regression Testing, User Acceptance Testing
Tools: Swagger, Postman, KeyRunner, Visual Studio, Azure DevOps
Other Strengths: Data Manipulation, Database Mining, Code and Automated Test Execution, API Flows, Cloud Service Platforms

Tools: Azure DevOps, Jira, Git, Github, Gcloud, NPM, Visual Studio, Webstorm
Methodologies: BDD, TDD, Mob Programming, Scrum
Frameworks, Platforms: C#/.Net, Azure, Google Cloud Platform

skills.name: Technologies

skills.name: Key Skills
keywords: Soft Skills: Strong communication, analytical and critical thinking skills
Other Strengths: Detail-oriented and highly scrutinous of technologies
Domain Knowledge: Experienced with privacy, security, auditing, and compliance requirements in healthcare

references.name: Alex Logatchov, colleague at AbsenceSoft, LLC
references.reference: I had the pleasure of having Anthony on my team is a QA Analyst at Absencesoft. He does a great job of juggling to duel needs of a truly great QA, managing the macro testing strategy and proficiently executing tricky test cases. Anthony is easy to collaborate with and bounce ideas off of and he leans in during those crucial team meeting.

references.name: Bas Hamer, colleague and mentor at Envision Technology Partners
references.reference:
I worked with Anthony as he transitioned into test automation as a new career. He went from knowing how to automate things in excel to writing C# with selenium and even creating programs for his personal interests on the side. 
 His strength in business requirements was a great asset that transitioned well into the QA space and his willingness to learn, and play with technology made it a great contribution in building test coverage on an enterprise software product.
